profile:
Reliable Contractor Experts
As a premier company dedicated to providing premier customer service, it is important to us to deliver unparalleled workmanship on every assignment.​ We offer a wide range of services to meet your project needs and ensure durable and cost effective workmanship.


Communication is Key
We will work with you to meet deadlines and coordinate with other related projects. We will maintain open communication with you to keep you up to date on the status of your job. We do this to guarantee that the project is completed according to your preferences.


Satisfaction Guaranteed
We strive to save you both time and money by combining our use of industry knowledge, the highest quality parts and equipment, and our dedication to delivering exceptional service. We will not leave the job until it is finished and you are satisfied.
specialities: Providing unparalleled service to your region!
warranty_terms: 2-5-10 Warranty Available. Kindly ask for more details.

profile:
Welcome to R. Raven Electric a proud member of the Better Business Bureau and Electrical Contractor in Vancouver, BC. With over twenty years of electrical contracting experience, we're the electrical experts that the Vancouver Lower Mainland relies upon for Residential, Industrial and Commercial Electrical Projects.

With a staff of eight professional and licensed electricians and state-of-the-art equipment, we have the resources to always come through for our clients and take care of their electrical installation requirements. Our team of licensed electricians work with clients to ensure that we exceed their electrical engineering and design expectations.
Commercial Electrical
Residential Electrical
New Construction Electrical
Home Automation
Data Cabling
Fire Alarm Systems

profile:
Koru Construction is a custom home builder & renovation specialist based in Maple Ridge BC. We serve Vancouver’s Lower Mainland and Fraser Valley. As a team we are easy to work with, extremely organized and have impeccable attention to detail.

Our goal is to make your vision a reality; we want to put your mind at ease and enjoy the journey. Let us show you the meaning of Koru through strength and peace in your new space.

Creating quality spaces since 2012, we pride ourselves in exceptional craftsmanship, work ethic, and an ecological approach to building your home.

As a custom home builder & renovation specialist, Koru Construction can help transform your home. We will work with you to create your vision on time and on budget.
services:
General Contracting
Residential Renovations
Residential Design Build
Tenant Improvements

profile:
Located in beautiful Port Coquitlam, Brycon is a family run, high-end residential construction firm that specializes in renovating and remodeling highly crafted single family homes and high valued condominiums.

We offer a broad range of services, ranging from Kitchen and bathroom renovations, to all types of flooring installations, to custom millwork and home automation systems.Brycon also has a vast background in exterior renovation projects, as well as home theatre installs.
